ai-patthana8.1:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana8.1:2.1_0: It’s not caused by the reason for the sake of this teaching to give up the aggregates of the three aggregates.
ai-patthana8.1:2.1_1: There are two aggregates, and the two aggregates constituents -
ai-patthana8.1:2.1_3: As long as you don’t give rise to the cause, you have no cause or reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.1:2.1_5: without cause or reason, without cause or reason, these things aren’t reason, for the sake of cause or reason,
ai-patthana8.1:3.1_0: or cause or reason why the teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.1:3.1_1: or cause or reason why the teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.1:3.1_2: without cause or reason, these things don’t arise for the sake of a cause or reason,
ai-patthana8.1:4.1_0: You don’t give rise to the teaching for the sake of cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.1:4.1_1: You don’t give rise to the cause or reason for the sake of not cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.1:4.1_2: without cause or reasoning or conditions,
ai-patthana8.1:4.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.1:5.1_0: Nine kinds of objection for nine objects ...
ai-patthana8.1:6.1_0: You should go to the same place as a collection of the same sleeping place and embracing the same way.
ai-patthana8.1:8.1_0: not the Dhamma cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.1:8.1_1: not the Dhamma cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.1:9.1_0: not the condition that cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.1:9.1_1: not the condition is not by way of teaching, nor by way of teaching condition.
ai-patthana8.1:10.1_0: And not being cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.1:10.1_1: And not being cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.1:10.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.1:11.1_4: When the five aparts are undetermined ...
ai-patthana8.1:11.1_6: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
